appendix.title: Creating useful bugreports
appendix.para: So, your kernel just crashed and you want to help the kernel developers out and send them a bug report so that the problem will have a chance to get fixed (if you don't let them know, odds are it will never get fixed.) But how do you do this? What kind of information do they need to help fix the problem? This appendix will go over the basics of how to create a useful bug report, and how to send it to the proper group of people.
